content.raw:
Thanks! I fixed the .sdf file per the requests. I also added a proper 3D mesh of the sensor that more accurately matches the physical appearance.

For anyone who wished to verify the specs, they can be found on the Scanse website at: https://s3.amazonaws.com/scanse/Sweep_user_manual.pdf
